Articles.Content: looks good

Opinions or ideas for Tel? This is an early texture for Tel but I'm not too sure about it.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Why don't you split the ocean into smaller lakes scattered across the surface, kind of like it actually is on Titan?
Lighten the terrain to counteract the black water(which I like)?

Why don't you split the ocean into smaller lakes scattered across the surface, kind of like it actually is on Titan?

Yeah I'll probably do that, just wasn't too sure on exactly what to do with Tel.

I added your pack on the Kopernicus Planet Wiki. I can't wait to see how this wonderful mod will grow, and just the fact that it's stock-alike makes it just perfect. Good luck on developing this mod,

-Jacob

PS, this is my first post on the forums

Thanks and welcome to the forums!

Thanks and welcome to the forums!

No problem man! And thank YOU too for taking your time and making mod that many of us will enjoy. Even though your pack is new and not very popular yet, something tells me it will get just as popular as OPM and Kerbal Galaxy- just give it some time.
I like this new texture a lot better. Lakes are a bit low res, but I'm working on fixing that. PQS is...well buggy but that is just the heightmap being strange.

I like this new texture a lot better. Lakes are a bit low res, but I'm working on fixing that. PQS is...well buggy but that is just the heightmap being strange.

http://i.imgur.com/8SX6dco.png

Wow this looks really epic! I would love to land on it some day.
Woah...

I really like the oddness of the moons here. However, the planet looks a little too Saturn in my opinion. As far as stockalike goes, Jool looks nothing like Jupiter. It's green. There's no reason that this has to be a proper orange. It could be blue or purple or something! But, it's still great work so far as it is! That was just an observation I had
New Saru texture. I like this one a bit more TBH.
Looks like Wexx's cousin!
I kind of preferred the multi-color yellow/blue texture you had before.
I can't wait to put my hands on this
Not to Nitpick, but I liked the old Saru texture better then the new one. BTW, awesome planet pack!

Some progress on Ensol, texture still needs A LOT of touching up.

I kind of preferred the multi-color yellow/blue texture you had before.
Not to Nitpick, but I liked the old Saru texture better then the new one. BTW, awesome planet pack!

I may touch it up a bit, but IMO this texture is more stockalike.

I can't wait to put my hands on this

Thanks!

Not to Nitpick, but I liked the old Saru texture better then the new one. BTW, awesome planet pack!

I would have to agree.
I also prefered the original texture. Maybe you could post two download links (when the mod is finished) with one having the old texture and the other one having the new texture.

How about this texture?

I may have accidentally deleted the original texture btw...
That's pretty good, I think there shouldnt be such a big color difference between the 2 hemispheres though.

This looks great man, i've been looking for a mod with just a saturn analogue and some moons, but you went above and beyond and added ensol which you've modelled after my favourite moon so thats great. As for Saru, I think the original texture is the best, but between the two newer ones I would have to choose the newest.
Just like what MrHappyFace said, it's nice, but the two hemispheres shouldn't have such different colors.

That's pretty good, I think there shouldnt be such a big color difference between the 2 hemispheres though.
Just like what MrHappyFace said, it's nice, but the two hemispheres shouldn't have such different colors.

Gotcha, I'll change it a bit so it's not a huge difference like in that picture.

This looks great man, i've been looking for a mod with just a saturn analogue and some moons, but you went above and beyond and added ensol which you've modelled after my favourite moon so thats great. As for Saru, I think the original texture is the best, but between the two newer ones I would have to choose the newest.

Thanks! Yeah Enceladus is one of my favorite moons so that is one of the reasons why I added it to the plans.
